description: {"blocks":[{"key":"n1lp","text":"This protocol details the assembly of a serine integrase-based platform for functional validation of genetic switch controllers in eukaryotic cells in animal.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
ethics_statement: {"blocks":[{"key":"7den0","text":"Experiments with animal cells must conform to all relevant institutional and governmental ethics regulations conforming to internationally-accepted standards, and must always have prior approval from an Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) and any other ethics committees involved.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"abivo","text":"Regarding acquisition and use of bovine primary fibroblasts in the development of the present protocol, all experimentation performed was approved by the Ethics Committee on the Use of Animals (CEUA) of Embrapa Genetic Resources and Biotechnology (Brasilia, Brazil) in March 2013 (approval reference no. 001/2013).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d059e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

Setup","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cd2qe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9s7ak","text":"Bovine fibroblast isolation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"67bsk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"emsl8","text":"Bovine fibroblast cells were isolated according to the protocol described by Freshney51 with modifications. The cells were removed from 14-month-old Nelore (Bos indicus) bull oxtail by biopsies and washed three times in 0.05% trypsin (Gibco). The cells were then transferred to 25-cm2 cell culture flasks and incubated in DMEM (Gibco) supplemented with 10% FCS (Gibco) and penicillin‒streptomycin at 37 °C in a 5% CO2 atmosphere. After three passages or when the fibroblast cultures showed homogeneity, the cells were ready for transfection. Cell cultures with 60% to 70% confluence were picked. ! CAUTION The use of bovine cells was performed under ethical guidelines and was approved by the Ethics Committee on the Use of Animals (CEUA) of Embrapa Genetic Resources and Biotechnology in March 2013 approval reference no. 001/2013.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e61eq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9npm7","text":"Culture medium stock","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aa8a3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cm9kl","text":"For 1 L of DMEM, measure approximately 90% of the volume to be prepared with sterile distilled water (15-20 °C), and slowly add the 13.5 g of DMEM powder under constant agitation at room temperature. After completely dissolving the DMEM powder, add 3.7 g of sodium bicarbonate (NaHCO3) per liter, complete with sterile distilled water up to 1 L and store at 4 °C for up to 6 months.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"buci7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cavgj","text":"Culture medium (working solution)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":33}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bnm83","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bc4np","text":"For each 400 mL of DMEM solution, add 40 mL of FBS (10% (vol/vol) final), 0.4 mL of penicillin/streptomycin (1% (vol/vol) final), 44 mg of 100X sodium pyruvate, xx mg of D-(+)-glucose, and 116 mg of L-glutamine 200 mM. Filter through a 0.22 μm Vacuum Filtration System and store at 4 °C for up to 2 months.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"94c79","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6olrq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1opef","text":"MTT stock solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dm1nt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9f90o","text":"Dissolve 500 mg of MTT powder in 10 mL of 1X PBS (pH 3.7), stir the solution for approximately 1 hour in the dark, sterilize it by filtration with a 0.22 µm filter ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8tc05","text":"▲CRITICAL STEP store 10 mL aliquots (50 mg/mL) at -20 °C in the steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"99bvm","text":"Cultivate bovine fibroblast cells at 5.0x105 cells per culture flask with a 75 cm2 surface area. Well area coverage, between 60-80% confluence. It takes approximately 8-10 days.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":43,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9ue0h","text":"Transfer the cells to a 1.5 mL centrifugation tube for flow cytometry analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"38g8b","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c8lld","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2iils","text":"▲CRITICAL STEP Store the tubes at 37°C protected from light before analysis.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3jjbj","text":"▲CRITICAL STEP Acquire at least 10,000 events in the viable gate to evaluate eGFP expression.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"38E9D7A212F54D7F825734B70257759E"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5v33u","text":"Count the cells with a Neubauer chamber and cultivate bovine fibroblasts and HEK 293T cells in 96-well plates at a density of 1x105 cells/well in triplicate and grown for   at   in a 5% CO2 atmosphere.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":188,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":171,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":176,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6sict","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"51fsf","text":"After 48 hours of transient cotransfection, incubate the cells with   of 3-(4,5-dimethylthiazol-2-yl)-2,5-diphenyltetrazolium bromide (MTT; Thermo Fisher Scientific) (5 mg/mL). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":68,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eqd2k","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"di00k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7fkta","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"a2nds","text":"▲CRITICAL  Protect from light! ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cv0r1","text":"▲CRITICAL For the negative control, use 20 μL of dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO) directly on the cells, in a final volume of 200 μL per well.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"A1ACD64B0A75490292BFBD09C01ABFDF"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"idbh","text":"Incubate for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":18,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2kk1u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":14400,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"74f40","text":"Remove the MTT solution and add   of DMSO to each well to dissolve formazan crystals.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bilm1","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4cqa7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ebv4t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"150","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"jhrp","text":"▲CRITICAL  perform the procedure in the absence of light and do not aspirate the crystals.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"132257C7E8E040129840EC7AE8E9CEEA"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6marp","text":"Read the absorbance at 595 nm in a plate reader or spectrophotometer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
